mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_ROLE_ID, EMAIL, NAME, TEL) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberRoleId},#{email},#{name},#{tel});
INSERT INTO MEMBER_DETAIL (MEMBER_ID, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, REG_DATE, ENABLED, PROFILE_IMG_NAME, INFO) VALUES (#{memberId},#{nickName}, #{password}, SYSDATE, #{enabled}, #{profileImgName}, #{info});
mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_ROLE_ID, EMAIL, NAME, TEL, POST_NUM, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, REG_DATE, PROFILE_IMG_NAME, INFO FROM MEMBER m JOIN MEMBER_DETAIL md on m.MEMBER_ID = md.MEMBER_ID left join ADDRESS_BUNDLE ab on m.MEMBER_ID = ab.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId};

SELECT m.MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_ROLE_ID, EMAIL, NAME, TEL, POST_NUM, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, REG_DATE, PROFILE_IMG_NAME, INFO FROM MEMBER m JOIN MEMBER_DETAIL md on m.MEMBER_ID = md.MEMBER_ID left join ADDRESS_BUNDLE ab on m.MEMBER_ID = ab.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.EMAIL = #{email};
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_DETAIL SET enabled=#{enabled} WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId};
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_ROLE_ID = #{memberRoleId} , NAME = #{name}, TEL = #{tel};
update MEMBER_DETAIL set NICKNAME = #{nickName}, PASSWORD = #{password}, PROFILE_IMG_NAME = #{profileImgName}, INFO = #{info}
update ADDRESS_BUNDLE set POST_NUM = #{postNum}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2};
